name: Die Again...
description:
Restarting in a 2d platformer is common... But what if your bodies laid there when you started over. In this game, use your dead bodies to solve puzzles!

This game is mostly as a test, to see how fun this mechanic would be. Only 8 levels, basic Main Menu.

Controls:

A, D - Move left and right

SPACE - Jump

R - Restart

Esc - Back to Main Menu
